description.ko: 프랙탈 기반의 꽃과 전자 이끼를 특징으로 하며, 기술에서 피어나는 생명력을 시적으로 묘사했습니다.
description.en: A poetic depiction of life emerging from technology, featuring fractal-based flowers and electronic moss.

prompt: An intricate digital lotus blooming from an oxidized copper circuit board, petals made of #89CFF0 translucent glass with #4A0E4E binary-coded veins. Nature is reclaiming technology through #50C878 mossy circuitry and #FFB6C1 glowing fractal petals. 8k resolution, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the digital foliage, soft bokeh background, cinematic lighting emphasizing the eternal spring of a digital garden.
